alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 6:19PM AKST until December 08 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY FOR NUNIVAK ISLAND AND THE KUSKOKWIM DELTA COAST... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibility as low as one half mile. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta Coast, mainly from Kipnuk to Newtok, including Mekoryuk and Toksook Bay. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will continue through Friday morning. The combination of snow and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility to one half mile at times. Rough surf is also possible along the coast, especially for northwest facing coastal communities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
